topic.title: People flee Google as DuckDuckGo grows
Tucker Carson interviewed Gab founder Andrew Torba 09/05/17.
Welcome to 1984: Big Brother Google now watching your every political move
.cat Domain a Casualty in Catalonian Independence Crackdown
topic.body:
On October 1, a referendum will be held on whether Catalonia, an autonomous region of the northeast of Spain, should declare itself to be an independent country.  The Spanish government has ruled the referendum illegal, and is taking action on a number of fronts to shut it down and to censor communications promoting it. One of its latest moves in this campaign was a Tuesday police raid of the offices of puntCAT, the domain registry that operates the .cat top-level domain, resulting in the seizure of computers, the arrest of its head of IT for sedition, and the deletion of domains promoting the October 1 referendum, such as refoct1.cat (that website is now available at an alternate URL).

The .cat top-level domain was one of the earliest new top-level domains approved by ICANN in 2004, and is operated by a non-governmental, non-profit organization for the promotion of Catalan language and culture. Despite the seizure of computers at the puntCAT offices, because the operations of the domain registry are handled by an external provider, .cat domains not connected with the October 1 referendum (including eff.cat, EFF's little-known Catalan language website) have not been affected.

We have deep concerns about the use of the domain name system to censor content in general, even when such seizures are authorized by a court, as happened here. And there are two particular factors that compound those concerns in this case. First, the content in question here is essentially political speech, which the European Court of Human Rights has ruled as deserving of a higher level of protection than some other forms of speech. Even though the speech concerns a referendum that has been ruled illegal, the speech does not in itself pose any imminent threat to life or limb.

The second factor that especially concerns us here is that the seizure took place with only 10 days remaining until the scheduled referendum, making it unlikely that the legality of the domains' seizures could be judicially reviewed before the referendum is scheduled to take place. The fact that such mechanisms of legal review would not be timely accessible to the Catalan independence movement, and that the censorship of speech would therefore be de facto unreviewable, should have been another reason for the Spanish authorities to exercise restraint in this case.

Whether it's allegations of sedition or any other form of unlawful or controversial speech, domain name intermediaries should not be held responsible for the content of websites that utilize their domains. If such content is unlawful, a court order directed to the publisher or host of that content is the appropriate way for authorities to deal with that illegality, rather than the blanket removal of entire domains from the Internet. The seizure of .cat domains is a worrying signal that the Spanish government places its own interests in quelling the Catalonian independence movement above the human rights of its citizens to access a free and open Internet, and we join ordinary Catalonians in condemning it.

Clear link: https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2017/09/cat-domain-casualty-catalonian-independence-crackdown
Archive link: http://archive.is/O8RRs

What is hate speech? In the country where I live anyone who likes Trump is considered a hater. Even the mention of the word Trump makes people hate you. Government itself spread anti-Trump hate. So what hate is is defined by government. And then government can decide what free speech is. I think that government should not be allowed to tell people what to think or say. Hate is a normal human feeling. Being a human does not say that that is always a pleasant thing.

Look kaffie, I have also been on t_d. I said I love Trump. What happened. I got nothing but hate mail in my mail box on Retdit on got nothing but insulted. So when you like or love someone is already reason enough to hares people.
Other one kaffie: Everything you say I consider hate speech. Now you. I think you can better be quiet.

No... kaffie I am not going to censor you. It was just an example. Everyone and every group think different about what hate speech is. 

When you are rich some people think everything that comes from you is hate speech.

Likewise when you are poor some people think everything that comes from you is hate speech.

What hate speech is is defined in the brain. And everyone has a different brain. So hate speech is defined different in every brain. You can only end hate speech by murdering everyone except yourself. Mao did about that.

I don't hate you kaffie. It was just an example.

I think developing something like zeronet is like love. It is your baby. You love to develop this and you love to develop that. Then come people on your zeronet network and start demanding this and that. All kind of Hitler people come say zeronet should do this and it should do that. And life as a developer becomes a nightmare. They come kill your baby.

When I steal something from someone else then the other person has an opinion about me. His opinion is probably that I should go to jail. You can write it down and say it is a law. But that is still an opinion. The law is nothing more then a collection of opinions. And you can enforce the rule of law by pointing a gun at someone. The only thing that makes the law a valid argument is a gun loaded with a bullet.

A society is not possible without rules. Just read Hobbes about it. In any society there is censorship. Censorship is one of the things that constitute society. Decency is also a form of censorship.

Human beings need also walls. Because humans are robbers. You will have to protect your property. Maybe your only property is a bed to sleep in. You need it and you need to protect it.

Look in Europe we had everywhere borders. When those borders were removed. Robbing started taking place everywhere. New borders came along: fences, surveillance cameras, everywhere security personnel patrolling, everyone had to have insurance against robbery and so many new other borders came in place.

With the decentralized options. I don't control the router with which I connect to the internet. ZeroTalk works very good. Freenet also works. I2P is rather slow for me. Seeding a torrent is not an option for me. webtorrent.io Work very good. BitChute works also pretty well, but I don't host any video's. Yacy work so for that I can download search options, but I cannot add something to it. So far my experience.

yacy.net – decentralised search, removes being reliant on a corporation for your search results
startpage.com – uses Googles engine but stands between you and google as a proxy
ixquick.com – same as Startpage
yandex.com – Russia's answer to Google
bing.com – Microsofts alternative
disconnect.me
https://searx.me/
http://gibiru.com/
https://deepsearch.tsignal.io/

And again those who owned a business against those who where employed. People just think in two modes. On / off, pro / anti, 0 / 1. It is or love or hate. In China they have yin and yang.

I see left / right thing more like football. You pick a side and start playing. It is a scale from the extreme left to the extreme right. You take just somewhere a position and start playing. A third you ask about children. A fourth you have to ask how his or her spouse is doing. If you do not use the right phrase one or the other will be angry and hate you this day or maybe this week. Etc...

The big difference between the Nazi's and the EU is that the Nazi's were anti-Jew and the EU is a pro-debt organization. The EU uses the same rhetoric as Hitler before WW2. A while back there was a youtube of Verhofstadt and I posted the equivalent youtube of Hitler. Immediately removed of course. And we had also a youtube of Timmermans. Hitler would have liked that. 

After WW2 the best of the best Nazi officers when to the USA. If you are very talented nobody cares if you are a Nazi. So why the allies ever went to Europe to conqueror Hitler. I don't know.   

Strange... We have to become globalists of government. But the EU wants its citizens to become Europeans. Not globalists. It is not allowed within the EU to disagree with the EU. They say that the difference with Hitler Germany is that in Hitler Germany you got the bullet. That is what they tell. 

So... the Nazi's have a lot in common with the EU.

Also in Europe a lot of left wing politicians tried to emulate Trump. When that went wrong for them, because they are not Trump, they payed the media money to make anti-Trump propaganda.  Very hypocrite ! Also EU leaders tried to emulate Trump. Now they are against Trump.

Also hypocrite this anti-Russia bullshit. They say Russia is bad. And you are not allowed to do anything in favor of the Russians. Well.... German automobile industry is building a giant factory in Russia. Suddenly they know nothing about that.
In Europe the definition of a racist, fascist, nazi, sexist is someone who disagrees with the EU. They redefined those words.

Maybe special to know for those who live in the US. In the EU does something like free speech not exist. You have freedom of opinion. But that freedom is also restricted. You are as a citizen of the EU only allowed to have pro-government opinions. When you have a different opinion they come after you. And when you say you don't have freedom of opinion then they say we did not kill you. Anything else they consider okay when you have a different opinion.

There is going to be no multi cultural society. We can see this happening within the EU. Different cultures have different values. In one society is being modest an asset. In another society it is considered not done. The EU does not accept this. The EU imposes EU culture and EU values. What they want is not a multi cultural society, but a mono cultural society. Europe has known many empires with their own coin. But despite central government policies cities invented their own coins and abolished the currency of the empire. They have introduced the euro. Nothing in the world can beat time and nature.

> [elspru](#comment_53_1A3XsuLB6P7LQPCw1QWASG7RGSwrCv6Xib): The NSA can see everything you are doing on your computer via the Clipper Chip in your CPU, either ARM's TrustZone, Intel's ME, or AMD's PSP. 5_13aB79mzuRLgDYzQthn9wzycjw77WyDXh6.body: Interesting question. I would not know an answer. But FreeNet has several levels of anonymity. FreeNet's objective is anonymity. ZeroNet is about distributed webhosting and there is added some anonymity, but it is not its objective. For complete secure communication you have to follow Snowden's example. Maybe a nice link about privacy, clear link alert: https://www.privacytools.io/

I think FreeNet is more anonymous but it comes with a drawback. Unwillingly you download and share content you probably don't like. And when you put something on FreeNet. And you want to delete it. Well, that is not really possible. You can only hope that it fades away. But since FreeNet is also OpenNet. Bots might archive it. The internet is a giant memory and records many many things about you.

> [m0ckingb3ard](#comment_31_1HGr5q2yEov55cZf7NE5qBkJvTVSJZVM6g): I'd like to believe RetroShare has a better mechanism, but it's so damn hard to find a (semi-)public node.

I understand. But I think it works as follows. You have a chat with someone on a board. You two have a common interest and want to talk about it in private. Next you can use the advanced mechanisms of RetroShare for easy communication.

I think when you want to have your say with people who have the same mindset. You just open your own private sub somewhere and invite others. Or look if there is already one. Suppose you have opinions that contradict authorities. I think that is no problem as long as it is not on the front page of something like Reddit. As long as you do not bother others you will have no problem in general.

I have a question too. So, I am experimenting a little with this FreeNet. And on both Windows and Linux the pc shuts down / gives a blue screen. I think this is strange. What could be the cause of this?
